back panel is done the same as the front panel but stop before the tapering 3 peaks tank top en ©anna erlandsson 2018 hookedbyanna com join the front and back panels put the two panels side by side in front of you right side facing up there are no obvious wrong or right sides to the panels decide which side looks best and don t forget to fasten any loose ends to the wrong side here i ve got my front panel to the left and my back panel to the right i ve lined up the stitches and started sewing line up the stitches of the two panels so they mirror each other now using a darning needle and a long strand of yarn stitch the panels together as shown
